question: Bureau of Energy Efficiency is a statutory body under which ministry?
option2: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
explanation:
The Union Power Ministry in partnership with Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE), has recently organised the 30th “National Energy Conservation Awards (NECA)” function. The event was organised at Vigyan Bhawan – New Delhi and telecasted as a virtual event.
BEE is a statutory body under the Ministry of Power that has a mandate to implement policy and programs in energy efficiency and conservation.
